## Read Data for Intel
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(quantmod)
```
## Download data
```{r}
getSymbols(c("INTC"), from = "2020-01-01")
```


## Long-term trend sicne 2020
```{r}
chartSeries(INTC, 
            theme="white", 
            TA="addSMA(200); addSMA(50)")
```

## Trend in last three months
```{r}
chartSeries(INTC, 
            subset = "2022-08-01::",
            theme="white", 
            TA="addVo();addBBands();addRSI(14); 
            addSMA(20); addSMA(50); addSMA(200)")
```
